short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your friend list bigger and valuable with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***Automatically add hyper targeted credit worthy customers and start conversations with them JUST BY CLICKING A BUTTON!***

Have you ever wondered how can you monetize your Facebook? To monetize anything you actually need leads. Customer Connector helps you to find targeted leads automatically and send them a friend request on behalf of you. You get your friend list filled up everyday by running this chrome extension. Now when you found all these leads its time for you to convert them with your marketing strategy.

Customer Connector chrome extension also helps you to send automated messages when you get a friend request from someone, When you accept or decline a friend request. So now you can verify a request if its from some real person or a bot. You can also start a conversation just after accepting a friend request or you can let someone know the reason behind declining the friend request.

Enjoy using Customer Connector while you are asleep or busy with your daily work/chores and let it do all the initial work you needed to do to make money from Facebook .
